casebody.data:
ORBAN, et al.
v.
PIKE CORPORATION, et al. No. 32A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2016. Scott M. Tyler, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. Glenn E. Ketner, III, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. David G. Schiller, Raleigh, for Orban, Michael. J. Daniel Albert, for Umberger, Annabelle, et al. Paul R. Dickinson, Jr., for Lieberg, Collin. Marc Ackerman, for Lieberg, Collin. Richard A. Maniskas, for Lieberg, Collin. Kurt F. Hausler, Charlotte, for Beickert, Edwin. Brian D. Long, for Beickert, Edwin.

The following order has been entered on the consent motion filed on the 14th of March 2016 by Defendant to Hold Appeals in Abeyance Pending Settlement:

*892"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of March 2016."
